# Expected Returns Generator (ERG)

Welcome to the Expected Returns Generator (from now on ERG). This app predicts prices and returns for a given set of stocks. 
Predictions are based on patterns found by different LSTM models. 
ERG also provides an investment portfolio that tries to maximize the Information Ratio of the given investment.

This wonderful app has been written in python, just two pieces of code are written in Bash and Batch in order to unify the execution of the code.
